original: JOHANSSON, Gustaf Otto, Köpman, Växjö, f Ronneby 15/11 90, gm Anna Karlsson. Start eft mångår prakt i järn- o velocipedbranschen i Växjö o Malmö tills m brod Ernst J fma Bröderna Johansson i Växjö 23 (cykel- o elektr aff).
translated: JOHANSSON, Gustaf Otto, Merchant, Växjö, b. Ronneby 15/11 90, m. Anna Karlsson. Started, after several years of apprenticeship in the iron and bicycle industry in Växjö and Malmö, a joint venture with his brother Ernst, called Bröderna Johansson in Växjö 23 (bicycle and electrical store).

structured.name: Gustaf Otto Johansson
structured.description: After several years of apprenticeship in the iron and bicycle industry in Växjö and Malmö, Gustaf Otto Johansson started a joint venture, Bröderna Johansson, with his brother Ernst in Växjö in 1923. The business primarily dealt with bicycles and electrical appliances.
